goals__remit:
We help develop security businesses in Belgium and Europe, covering intrusion and fire detection, camera surveillance, biometric authentication and access control, as well as active protection methods, locksmith's work and alarm management.  
 
To this end, we deliver research, counseling and public affairs services for the security, electrical contracting and construction industries, with special attention for market access and market development issues.
